Name: How to be Best Russian Game Developer
About the game: How to become a popular Russian developer? I do not know, but ... I know how to become the best Russian developer! This is a short satirical clicker game, which in itself is not a game, but a satire over the current trend in the Russian GameDev. You have 5 ideas that will bring you dollars! The simpler the idea, the more successful and the more it brings. See for yourself! Features: - Everyone's favorite clicker genre: - Short story; - Funny satire (I think, but not a fact); - The minimum price, but how else ?! All coincidences with reality are random. All the characters are fictitious. Russian is not my first language. It's all a developer's fantasy. One of these facts is a lie.
